conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: What the... where am I? My head's all fuzzy...

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: What on earth are you babbling about? Use your words.

conversation.speaker: player
conversation.text: Meow. Meow meow meow meow! (with a sense of urgency)

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Wait, I know you. You're the fabled magician of the Fablewoods. Gee, sucks they couldn't send a more articulate one...

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Chin up, soldier. You must go save my sisters. Take this with you to help you in battle.
